name: Oportun Financial Corporation
description: Oportun Financial Corporation is a financial technology company founded in 2005, providing affordable and responsible personal loans to underserved consumers. Headquartered in San Carlos, California, Oportun leverages technology to simplify the borrowing process and ensure that customers can access credit without the need for traditional credit scores. The company offers a range of loan products designed to meet the needs of individuals who may not have access to conventional banking services. Oportun's mission is to create a more inclusive financial system that empowers individuals to improve their financial health. With a focus on transparency, Oportun seeks to educate its customers about financial literacy and responsible borrowing practices. The company operates through a combination of online and physical locations, allowing for a personalized customer experience. Oportun has been recognized for its commitment to responsible lending, with a focus on providing loans that help customers build credit and achieve their financial goals. By using advanced data analytics and machine learning, Oportun aims to assess creditworthiness more accurately than traditional methods, thereby expanding access to credit for millions of Americans.
